experience.title: Research Scholar
experience.description: My current research includes Supply chain planning, Supply Chain Economics and Supply Chain Policy formulation with aid of Applied Mechanism Design theory, Market Design and Data Science tools to provide solutions to issues in Inbound section Public Distribution System, a Social Supply Chain with Hetoscedastic and Data with Asymmetries. My implements include Prediction cum Multidimensional analysis of Supply considering Multiagent Interaction models to Plan the Inbound section inclusive of Behavioral Decision Making Mechanisms and models for Individual agent under relaxed assumptions on Rationality, Farmer Decision Making Mechanisms using Multi-armed Bandit approach, Pricing Strategies, and Policy Formulation, Supplier Selection, Resource Allocation, Facility location MechanismsBargaining, Negotiation, Market Design, Market Failures analysis and its effect on Supply Chain Planning, Auction Design and analysis, Effect of Information elicitation and Information Networks on supply chain planning, Network Interdiction games and mechanisms along with resilience strategies at various planning horizons.
experience.description_html: My current research includes Supply chain planning, Supply Chain Economics and Supply Chain Policy formulation with aid of Applied Mechanism Design theory, Market Design and Data Science tools to provide solutions to issues in Inbound section Public Distribution System, a Social Supply Chain with Hetoscedastic and Data with Asymmetries. My implements include Prediction cum Multidimensional analysis of Supply considering Multiagent Interaction models to Plan the Inbound section inclusive of Behavioral Decision Making Mechanisms and models for Individual agent under relaxed assumptions on Rationality, Farmer Decision Making Mechanisms using Multi-armed Bandit approach, Pricing Strategies, and Policy Formulation, Supplier Selection, Resource Allocation, Facility location MechanismsBargaining, Negotiation, Market Design, Market Failures analysis and its effect on Supply Chain Planning, Auction Design and analysis, Effect of Information elicitation and Information Networks on supply chain planning, Network Interdiction games and mechanisms along with resilience strategies at various planning horizons.
